results.name: Pascal-(1,6,1) array.
comment: One of a family of Pascal-like arrays. A007318 is equivalent to the (1,0,1)-array. A008288 is equivalent to the (1,1,1)-array. Rows include A016993, A081591, A081592. Coefficients of the row polynomials in the Newton basis are given by A013614.
formula: Square array T(n, k) defined by T(n, 0)=T(0, k)=1, T(n, k)=T(n, k-1)+6T(n-1, k-1)+T(n-1, k). Rows are the expansions of (1+6x)^k/(1-x)^(k+1).

E.g.f. for the n-th subdiagonal, n = 0,1,2,..., equals exp(x)*P(n,x), where P(n,x) is the polynomial Sum_{k = 0..n} binomial(n,k)*(7*x)^k/k!. For example, the e.g.f. for the second subdiagonal is exp(x)*(1 + 14*x + 49*x^2/2) = 1 + 15*x + 78*x^2/2! + 190*x^3/3! + 351*x^4/4! + 561*x^5/5! + .... - _Peter Bala_, Mar 05 2017
